# WAPairedDevice.DevicesSequence

**Structure**

A sequence that vends updates to a paired device list, as the list changes.

## Declaration

```swift
struct DevicesSequence
```

## Overview

The `DevicesSequence` produces an asynchronous sequence of [doc://com.apple.wifiaware/documentation/WiFiAware/WAPairedDevice/Devices] items, providing the latest snapshot of the paired devices known to your app.

## Getting an initial snapshot

- **current()**: Fetches a one-time snapshot of all paired devices that are currently known and  accessible to your app.

## Getting async updates

- **WAPairedDevice.DevicesSequence.AsyncIterator**: An iterator for the sequence of devices.
- **makeAsyncIterator()**: Makes an asynchronous iterator that provides successive device snapshots when the list of paired devices known to the app changes.
- **WAPairedDevice.DevicesSequence.Element**: A dictionary holding a snapshot of currently paired devices accessible to your app.

## Paired devices

- **WAPairedDevice**: A known Wi-Fi Aware device that your app can connect to.
- **WAPairedDevice.Devices**: A dictionary holding a snapshot of currently paired devices accessible and known to your app.
- **WAPairedDevice.PairingInfo**: A collection of unauthenticated information the system receives from a device before it’s paired for the first time.

## Conforms To

- AsyncSequence
